abstract: Fred Piscop remembers a wartime speech in today's Diagramless crossword puzzle.
snippet: Fred Piscop remembers a wartime speech in today's Diagramless crossword puzzle.
lead_paragraph: Administrivial Notepad Alert! Today's Diagramless is 17 squares wide by 17 squares deep with regular crossword symmetry. The entry for 1-Across begins in the sixth square of the first row.
